adm:managed-object.name: cram-md5-sasl-mechanism-handler
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
is used to perform all processing related to SASL CRAM-MD5 authentication.

adm:property.name: identity-mapper-dn
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the DN of the identity mapper to use.
adm:property.adm:description: Specifies the DN of the configuration entry for the identity mapper that should be used to match the client authentication ID to a user entry.
